column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////BLOOPER: The funny thing is that we didn't realise that Bosscat was in the Highland Village area; my friend and I looked like bums that night
column2: but the place looked like it had dress code and if you weren't dressed for the occasion
column3: no service. When the hostess started leading us to our table
column4: we just kept walking and walking
column5: but when we got to an actual table
column6: we both had a sigh of relief because we literally thought that she was escorting us out to some back exit. Hah!
